org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.command

接口 AllocationCommand

  • 所有超级接口:
    NamedWriteable, ToXContent, ToXContentObject, Writeable
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractAllocateAllocationCommand, AllocateEmptyPrimaryAllocationCommand, AllocateReplicaAllocationCommand, AllocateStalePrimaryAllocationCommand, BasePrimaryAllocationCommand, CancelAllocationCommand, MoveAllocationCommand

    public interface AllocationCommand
extends NamedWriteable, ToXContentObject
    A command to move shards in some way. Commands are registered in NetworkModule.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.ToXContent

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.elasticsearch.common.xcontent.ToXContent

    • 方法详细资料

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        Get the name of the command
        返回:
        name of the command

      • execute

        RerouteExplanation execute(RoutingAllocation allocation,
                           boolean explain)
        Executes the command on a RoutingAllocation setup
        参数:
        allocation - RoutingAllocation to modify
        抛出:
        ElasticsearchException - if something happens during reconfiguration

      • getWriteableName

        default java.lang.String getWriteableName()
        从接口复制的说明: NamedWriteable
        Returns the name of the writeable object
        指定者:
        getWriteableName 在接口中 NamedWriteable

      • getMessage

        default java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getMessage()
        Returns any feedback the command wants to provide for logging. This message should be appropriate to expose to the user after the command has been applied
